thread.title: Maersk Oil to Cut Staff by up to 12%
thread.title_full: Maersk Oil to Cut Staff by up to 12% - WSJ

author: Kjetil Malkenes Hovland
title: Maersk Oil to Cut Staff by up to 12%
text:
Maersk Oil, part of Danish conglomerate A.P. Møller-Maersk A/S, said Monday that it would cut 10% to 12% of its workforce as part of a plan to reduce operating costs by a fifth by the end of next year, amid weak oil prices.
The announcement brings the number of job cuts by the company this year to 1,250 from a staff of 4,500.
